metadata.title: CVE-2012-2400 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Unspecified vulnerability in wp-includes/js/swfobject.js in WordPressbefore 3.3.2 has unknown impact and attack vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2400` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 3.3.2+dfsg-1
wordpress-l10n - 3.3.2+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.3.2+dfsg-1').
